revised_title: Observations on the Effects of Magenta and Tannin on Blood Corpuscles
tldr: The author investigates the effects of magenta and tannin solutions on blood corpuscles, observing changes in their structure and morphology. The study reveals the presence of a dark-red spot in the cell wall and the formation of projections or pullulations on the surface of the corpuscles, suggesting a more complex structure than previously thought.
